element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Applicable grade levels as defined by SIF.

element.name: BloomsTaxonomyLevels
element.desc: This is a taxonomy of educational objectives based on three "domains:" Affective, Psychomotor, and Cognitive. For the purposes of assigning attributes to learning resources, the SIF specification is limited to the cognitive domain, including knowledge, comprehension, application, analysis, synthesis and evaluation.

element.name: MultipleIntelligences
element.desc: An educational theory that describes at least eight different kinds of "intelligences." These include linguistic, logical-mathematical, spatial, bodily-kinesthetic, musical intelligence, interpersonal, intrapersonal and naturalist.

element.name: InstructionalStrategies
element.desc: The various ways that instruction is delivered to achieve learning objectives and concepts.

element.name: LearningObjectives
element.desc: Description of learning objective(s) for this lesson, i.e., "Student will be able to use Pythagorean Theorem."â€”equates to 'benchmark' or 'goal' or other terminology

element.name: ResourceTypes
element.desc: Type of resource

element.name: Summary
element.desc: A summary of the content.

element.name: Title
element.desc: The title of the content.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code representing the grade level.

object.name: SEAInfo
object.desc: This object is designed to facilitate the transfer of State Education Agency (SEA) directory information to the Department of Education (USED) through the Education Data Exchange Network (EDEN).

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this SEA.

element.name: NCESId
element.desc: The NCES-assigned identifier for this SEA.

element.name: SEAName
element.desc: The full legally accepted name of the SEA.

element.name: SEAURL
element.desc: URL for the SEA.

element.name: CSSOContact
element.desc: Chief State School Officer contact information.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The SEA's phone number(s).

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The SEA's address(es).

element.name: OperationalStatus
element.desc: Operational condition of an SEA.

element.name: SEAContact
element.desc: The two-digit Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) Code for the State, District of Columbia, and the possessions and freely associated areas of the United States (e.g. Puerto Rico).

element.name: PublishInDirectory
element.desc: Indicates whether or not this SEA contact's information should be published in a directory of SEA information.

element.name: FIPSStateCode
element.desc: The two-digit Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) Code for the State, District of Columbia, and the possessions and freely associated areas of the United States (e.g. Puerto Rico).

element.name: AgencyIdNumber
element.desc: A number used in EDEN to uniquely uniquely identify state agencies.
